type.name: product_organization_item
type.description: An product_organization_item extends organization assignment to product instances.

type.name: product_person_and_organization_item
type.description: A product_person_and_organization_item extends person and organization assignment to product instances.

rule.name: product_requires_product_category
rule.description: The product_requires_product_category rule specifies that all instances of product shall have at least 1 associated product_related_product_category instance.

where.label: WR1
where.description: Each instance of product shall be associated to at least one instance of product_related_product_category.

rule.name: restrict_product_category_name
rule.description: The restrict_product_category_name rule specifies that each instance of product_category shall have a name of 'assembly', 'detail', 'part', 'raw material', 'document', 'functionality', or 'requirement' or the description value shall exist.

description.p: Each instance of product_category shall have a name of 'part', 'raw material', 'document', 'functionality', or 'requirement' or the description value shall exist.
The value 'assembly' identifies a part that consists of a collection of other parts which are put together to satisfy a particular function.
The value 'detail' identifies a part that exists at the lowest level of the bill of materials structure or does not have a parts list.
The value 'document' specifies the item plays the role of a document.
The value 'part' specifies the item plays the role of a part.
The value 'raw material' specifies the item plays the role of raw material.
The value 'requirement' specifies this type of classification is used to indicate that for an Item certain regulations have to be considered.
